description: This article is about the Marvel Comics character. Vivisector can also refer to a person who engages in vivisection.For the novel, see The Vivisector. For the first-person shooter, see Vivisector: Beast Inside.Vivisector (Myles Alfred) is a fictional character, an openly gay intellectual mutant featured as a member of X-Statix by Marvel Comics. He first appeared in X-Force #116 and was created by Peter Milligan and Mike Allred.
name: Vivisector
